DOC.brief_summary: This phase 2/3 evaluate efficacy ibrutinib combination nab-paclitaxel gemcitabine first line treatment patient metastatic pancreatic adenocarcinoma .
DOC.brief_title: Study Ibrutinib v Placebo , Combination With Nab-paclitaxel Gemcitabine , First Line Treatment Patients With Metastatic Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma ( RESOLVE )
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically confirm diagnosis pancreatic adenocarcinoma .
